exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type H : forall P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop, (forall t : btree A, P [t] t) -> (forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P l1 t3) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), cover l b -> P l b empty : A t : btree A l1, l2 : list (btree A) H1 : cover l1 t H2 : permutation l1 l2 Unable to unify "cover [?M2059] ?M2059" with "cover l2 t".

exceptions.exn: No such goal. Focus next goal with bullet *.

original: intros t l1 l2 H1 H2. apply cover_ind with (l := l1) (b := t). - intros t. apply cover_one. - intros l1' l2' t1 t2 t3 H3 H4 IH. apply cover_node with (t1 := t1) (t2 := t2) (t3 := t3). + apply permutation_trans with (l2 := t1 :: t2 :: l2). * apply H3. * apply permutation_cons_ex in H4. destruct H4 as [l3 [l4 [H4 H5]]]. subst. apply permutation_skip. apply IH. + apply H4.
